ModMetaData.description:
Do you like build base? I like build base. But lots of events get in way of build base, so I remove them.
-Removes annoying events + raids that get in the way of build base -Good / some neutral events still happen -[NEW!] difficulty that is more peaceful than peaceful
Should be compatible with everything...probably.
